array

protected java.lang.Object[] array
Is the internal one dimensional array

size

protected int[] size
A dimension size array.
for example 
int a[][] = new int[10][15]
have the
dimension size array {10, 15}

sizeOffset

protected int[] sizeOffset
The offset values for each dimension.

calcOffset(int[])
Constructor Detail

MDDA

public MDDA(int... dimensionSize)
Creates a generic-one-dimensional array with multi dimensional array API access.

Parameters:
dimensionSize - var args dimension size
For example: 
new Integer[3][5][2] -> new MDDA<Integer>(3,5,2);

MDDA

public MDDA(MDDA<T> toCopy)
Makes a copy of the toCopy object

Parameters:
other -

MDDA

public MDDA(T[] oneDimArray,
            boolean bind,
            int... dimensionSize)
Converts the one dimensional array into a MDDA with multi dimensional API access

Parameters:
oneDimArray - array which should be converted into multi dimensions
bind - call by reference if true - otherwise a copy of the array will be genrated.
See Also:
#MDDA(int...)}
